Introduction

HyeRin is a South Korean dancer, singer, and actress under MODHAUS.

On May 1, 2018, it was announced that HyeRin had signed an exclusive contract with Kids Planet. She made her acting debut the same year, in December, in the web drama "Between Us". HyeRin left the agency sometime in 2019.

On May 17, 2022, HyeRin was introduced as the second member of the girl group tripleS under MODHAUS. She first debuted with the sub-unit Acid Angel from Asia on October 28, 2022, with the mini album "ACCESS". With their first ten revealed members, tripleS debuted on February 13, 2023, with the mini album "ASSEMBLE".

As a member of tripleS, HyeRin was placed in the sub-units Acid Angel from Asia, ACID EYES, LOVElution, and Visionary Vision.
